name: $html
desc: Page is markdown with templating.  Will use the template to create a file that imports the markdown file prior to post-processing.

name: $markdown
desc: Page is xml with templating.  Will use the template to create a file that imports the source file and run the nominated XSLT transform (see parameters) if present prior to post-processing.

name: $xml
desc: Page will be generated by the publication process - no source to bring across.
